name: myCoolFacts
0:
”Alexa, open cool facts now”
”Alexa, ask Cool Facts Now for a cool fact”
”Alexa, ask Cool Facts Now for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cool facts now
des: This skill chooses a fact at random from a list of cool facts, of varied genre, and tells it to you when asked to. The list of facts were chosen by the author from varied online resources and is limited to a small number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
